# Spinner
```import { Spinner } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

Spinner component is a circular animation that tells user when something is on progress. As example: page loading animation.

<Story id="atom-spinner--default" />


## Utils Props

There's no specific utility props for this component

## Component Props
<Props of={Spinner} />

### color

`color` prop adjusts the color of spinner component.<br />

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-spinner--color" />
</Preview>

### speed

`speed` prop tells how long the the spinner to take one revolution (in second).<br />

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-spinner--speed" />
</Preview>
